mapper.sql: role_id, role_code, role_name, role_desc, create_user_id, create_time, modified_user_id, modified_time, status, is_delete
mapper.select: SELECT r.role_id AS roleId FROM `sys_role` r INNER JOIN `sys_user_role` ur ON r.`role_id`=ur.`role_id` AND ur.`user_id`=#{userId}

select sr.role_id,sr.role_code, sr.role_name, sr.role_desc, sr.create_user_id, sr.create_time, sr.modified_user_id, sr.modified_time,sr.status, sr.is_delete,sar.menu_id from sys_auth_role sar left join sys_role sr on sar.role_id = sr.role_id
